reasons: Prediction_0 has the correct lyrics; Prediction_1 and Prediction_2 have additional and incorrect lines;
output:
1 How lovely is your dwelling place, O Lord of hosts!
2 How my soul longs, indeed it faints for the courts of the Lord!
3 My heart and my flesh sing out for joy to the Living God.
4 Even the sparrow finds a home, and the swallow finds a nest, where she may safely lay her yard.
5 At your altars, O Lord, my King and my God, happy are those who live in your house, ever singing your praise.
Selah
6 Happy are those who strengthen you, for their hearts are highways designed.
7 As they go through the valleys sad, make it a place of springs.
8 The early rain falls, filling the pools. They go from strength to strength.
9 The God of gods will be seen in Zion, O Lord God of hosts, hear my prayer.
1 Give ear, O God of Jacob!
Selah
10 For just one day within your courts is better than a thousand gone.
11 I would rather keep the door than live in tents of sin.
12 For the Lord God is a sun and a shield, he gives favour and honour.
13 No good thing does God withhold from those who walk uprightly.
1 O Lord God of hosts, happy are all who trust in you.
